title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Collaborative Learning Projects through Mathematical Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Using a gamification platform, over 80% of learners achieve active participation in the mathematics problem-solving process.
Through collaborative learning projects, 90% of learners apply team-based problem-solving strategies, maintaining a difference of 10% or less between peer and self-assessment scores.
At the end of the 6-month course, over 75% of learners apply problem-solving strategies acquired from game-based learning to actual test situations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
